solution_line_template: Tamtam has a total of {purple_shells} + {pink_shells} + {yellow_shells} + {blue_shells} = <<{purple_shells}+{pink_shells}+{yellow_shells}+{blue_shells}={non_orange_shells}>>{non_orange_shells} shells that are not orange.
Therefore, Tamtam has a total of {total_shells} - {non_orange_shells} = <<{total_shells}-{non_orange_shells}={orange_shells}>>{orange_shells} orange shells.
